Zed has alot of outplay potential.

Zed is the first ninja in 2 centuries to unlock the ancient, forbidden ways. He defied his clan and master, threw off the balance and discipline that had locked him all of his life. Zed now offers power to those who embrace knowledge of the shadows, and slays those who stay to ignorance.

"Balance is a lie - we are the true ninjas." -Zed

Zed challanged his master's teachings by using forbidden techniques and followed his dark side.
